Function reference

Encuesta continua de Hogares (ECH)

recipes
Recetas de la ECH
estimate_education_level.()
Estimate labor market indicators based on the ECH
estimate_labor_indicators.()
Estimate labor market indicators based on the ECH
to_personas.()
Realizar estimaciones a nivel de persona para la ECH

Encuesta de Actividades de Innovación e Inversión (EAII)

estimate_employment_ai.()
Estimate the number of people engaged in innovation activities
estimate_investment_ai.()
Estimate investment in innovation activities for the period
estimate_professionals_id.()
Estimate the number of people engaged in I+D activities
estimate_ratio_activities.()
Estimate the proportion of innovative companies by type of activity
estimate_ratio_innovation.()
Estimate the proportion of the type of innovation
estimate_ratio_innovative.()
Estimate the percentage of innovative companies
estimate_ratio_obstacle_innovation.()
Estimate the ratio obstacle to innovation
estimate_ratio_public_support.()
Estimate the proportion of public support
estimate_ratio_result_innovation.()
Estimate the result of innovation

Funciones <utils>

compute()
Compute a new variable
get_weight.()
Get a weight
load_base.()
Crear un grupo para luego particionar la poblaci'on y calcular el total poblacional en cada momento
load_recipes_ech.()
Load and apply the recipe from a database table to an ECH
load_recipes_from_db.()
Load and apply the recipe from a database table
normalize_names.()
Normalize names
recode()
Crear un grupo para luego particionar la poblaci'on y calcular el total poblacional en cada momento
set_weight.()
Set a weight
to_ciiu4.()
Clasificación de CIIU Revisión 3 a CIIU Revisión 4 adaptada por el INE.
to_personas.()
Realizar estimaciones a nivel de persona para la ECH
to_usd.()
Realizar estimaciones a nivel de persona para la ECH
validar_serie.()
Validar serie

Funciones <stats>

stats_proportion.()
Estimate a mean from a sample of data with H-T
stats_counts.() stats_totals.()
Estimate a count's from a sample of data with H-T
stats_ratio.()
Estimate a ratio from a sample of data with H-T
